additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactician
additionalAbilities.description: When in groups of more than 2, darklings will attempt to gang up on singular opponents and close distances with long ranged attackers. This Darkling, with its superior intellect, uses its reaction to wordlessly give telepathic orders to any Darkling or Darkforme Overwatch it can see within 100 ft. If the Darkling follows this command, they receive a +1 bonus to the action.

additionalAbilities.name: Degenerate Regenerator
additionalAbilities.description: If unwounded for 2 rounds, the Darkforme will begin to coalesce its being back together. Every round after the first round it is not wounded, the Darkforme Overwatch can restore 1d6 hitpoints at the start of its turn provided it does not move more than 10 ft in that turn.

actions.name: Multi-Tendril Lash
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Slashing): +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 3)

actions.name: Shuddering Pound
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Blunt): +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d10+2)

actions.name: Shadowmist Jaunt
actions.description: Teleport 20 ft (Movement Action)

flavor.description: Small abomination, wheezing evil

additionalAbilities.name: Clumsy Flier
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Caller has poor control over its flight, and its flying speed is halved in strong winds or heavy rain.

additionalAbilities.name: Piercing Call (Recharge 5-6)
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Caller emits a high-pitched, reverberating screech. Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear the call must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of its next turn. Additionally, there is a 50% chance that the call attracts 1d4 Darkformes to the Caller’s location after 1d4 rounds. The DM determines where and how the Darkformes arrive.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Wing Flap
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4 - 1) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5 ft.

flavor.description: Small abomination, wailing evil

additionalAbilities.name: Clumsy Flier
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Yowler has poor control over its flight, and its flying speed is halved in strong winds or heavy rain.

additionalAbilities.name: Ordure Wail (Recharge 5-6)
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Yowler emits a low, resonant tone that threatens to humiliate its enemies. Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear the wail must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature suffers an embarrassing "brown note incident," momentarily losing control of their bowels. The creature is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, the creature is unaffected but deeply unsettled. Additionally, there is a 50% chance that the wail attracts 1d4 Darklings to the Yowler’s location after 1d4 rounds. The DM determines where and how the Darklings arrive.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Wing Flap
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5 ft.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, stalking evil

additionalAbilities.name: Shadow Stalker
additionalAbilities.description: While in dim light or darkness, the Darkling Pack Alpha has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can Hide as a bonus action.

additionalAbilities.name: Pounce
additionalAbilities.description: If the Darkling Pack Alpha moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the Pack Alpha can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Pack Alpha has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the Pack Alpha’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Ambush (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Darkling Pack Alpha teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space in dim light or darkness that it can see. It can make a claw attack immediately after teleporting.

flavor.description: Small abomination, stalking evil

additionalAbilities.name: Shadow Stalker
additionalAbilities.description: While in dim light or darkness, the Darkling Shade-Sneak has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Shade-Sneak has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, wailing evil

additionalAbilities.name: Distracting Wail
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Bellowbelly’s torso-mounted mouth produces an eerie, discordant wail that affects all creatures within 30 ft. As a reaction on another creature's turn, the Bellowbelly may emit this sound. Any creature within range that can hear the wail must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or suffer disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Darkling Bellowbelly makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

flavor.description: Large abomination, brooding evil

additionalAbilities.name: Multiattack
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Cavesweller can make three attacks: two with its claws or tendrils, and one with its bite.

additionalAbilities.name: Lurker of the Subterrane
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Cavesweller has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in natural cave or underground environments.

additionalAbilities.name: Tormented Wail (Recharge 5-6)
additionalAbilities.description: The malformed head and torso-mounted mouth emit an unearthly screech. Creatures within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they take 11 (2d10) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half damage and are unaffected.

additionalAbilities.name: Shadowmist Jaunt (2/Day)
additionalAbilities.description: The Cavesweller can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space in dim light or darkness that it can see. After teleporting, it can make one Tendril Lash attack as part of the same action.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Slashing): +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 5).

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Piercing): +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 5).

actions.name: Tendril Lash
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Slashing): +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5).

actions.name: Blistering Wail (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Cavesweller unleashes a powerful shriek charged with dark energy. Ranged 120 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is within 30 feet of the Cavesweller, it must also succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn due to disorientation.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, brackish evil

additionalAbilities.name: Amphibious
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Brackling can breathe both air and water.

additionalAbilities.name: Ink Jet Dash
additionalAbilities.description: While airborne, the Darkling Brackling can expel a jet of dark, brackish ink behind it, propelling itself forward. When not targeting an enemy with its Ink Spray, the Brackling may use this ability to take the Dash action.

additionalAbilities.name: Obscuring Ink Spray (Recharge 5-6)
additionalAbilities.description: The Brackling ejects a 15-foot cone of ink that obscures vision in its area for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong current. Creatures caught in the spray must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Tendril Lash
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

flavor.description: Small abomination, sad evil

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: When in groups of more than 2, darklings will attempt to gang up on singular opponents and close distances with long ranged attackers.

actions.name: Tendril Lash
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Slashing): +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 3).

actions.name: Shuddering Pound
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Blunt): +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d10).

flavor.description: Small abomination, hungy evil

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: When in groups of more than 2, darklings will attempt to gang up on singular opponents and close distances with long ranged attackers.

actions.name: Slurp
actions.description: Grapple Attack (Piercing/Blunt): +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3). This degenerate darkling will attempt to swallow prey and then chew upon them. This process is initiated in the same manner as a grapple.

actions.name: Shuddering Pound
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Blunt): +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 3).

flavor.description: Small abomination, squeaky evil

additionalAbilities.name: Irresistibly Chirpy
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling Bellowbelly Cubling constantly emits high-pitched chirping noises. Once per round, there is a 10% chance (roll of 19-20 on a d20) that these sounds attract 1d4 larger Darklings or up to 2d6 Cublings to its location after 1d4 rounds. A coin flip determines whether these Darklings treat the Cubling as prey or allies. If they are deemed prey, all further attracted Darklings will see them as prey.

additionalAbilities.name: Swarm Instinct
additionalAbilities.description: The Cubling gains advantage on attack rolls if two or more other Darkling Cublings are within 5 feet of its target.

actions.name: Playful Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Tiny Claw Swipe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

flavor.description: Large abomination, salty evil

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactician
additionalAbilities.description: When in groups of more than 2, darklings will attempt to gang up on singular opponents and close distances with long ranged attackers. This Darkling, with its superior intellect, is capable of using its reaction to wordlessly give telepathic orders to any Darkling, Darkforme Overwatch, or Darkforme Enforcer it can see within 100 ft. If the darkling follows this command, they receive a +1 bonus to the action.

additionalAbilities.name: Degenerate Regenerator
additionalAbilities.description: If unwounded for 1 round, the Darkforme will begin to coalesce its being back together. Every round after the first round it is not wounded, the Darkforme Enforcer can restore 1d8 hitpoints at the end of its turn provided it does not move more than 10 ft in that turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Darkform Enforcer makes three attacks: two with its tendrils and one with its Pound attack.

actions.name: Tendril Barrage
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Slashing): +8 to hit, reach 15 ft, up to 3 targets. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6).

actions.name: Pound
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack (Blunt): +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Blistering Beam
actions.description: Energy Weapon Attack (Piercing): +7 to hit, range 100 ft (300 ft on long range), one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4).

flavor.description: Small abomination, gliding evil

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: This Darkling-Paralurker has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Talon Kick
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

flavor.description: Small abomination, unsettling evil

additionalAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
additionalAbilities.description: This Weirdling-Paralurker has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and isn’t incapacitated.

additionalAbilities.name: Unsettling Reconfiguration
additionalAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP (but not less than -9 HP), the Weirdling transforms back into a Darkling-Paralurker. Any creature within 25 ft. that witnesses this transformation must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or suffer a "brown note incident," losing their reactions until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Talon Kick
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, frail and insatiably hungry

additionalAbilities.name: Partial-Swallow
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkling-Hungerer successfully grapples a creature, that creature is partially swallowed. At the start of each of the Hungerer's turns, the swallowed creature takes 1d6 crushing damage. The grappled creature can attempt to escape as an action by making a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (DC 12).

actions.name: Gnawing Swipe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit, the target takes 4 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or be grappled (thus triggering Partial-Swallow).

flavor.description: Large abomination, a menacing mid-boss with a voracious maw

additionalAbilities.name: Large Build
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkforme-Hungore counts as one size larger when grappling opponents.

additionalAbilities.name: Ventral Maw
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkforme-Hungore hits a creature with its Ventral Maw attack, it grapples the target and attempts to swallow it. A grappled target is partially restrained and, while swallowed, takes 2d6 compressive asphyxiative damage at the start of each of the Hungore's turns. The swallowed creature can attempt to escape by making a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (DC 14) as an action. If the creature fails to escape within 10 rounds, it dies.

actions.name: Ventral Maw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit, the target takes 10 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage and is grappled (swallowed) by the Darkforme-Hungore, triggering the Ventral Maw effect.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, a stealthy aquatic predator with a predatory grin

additionalAbilities.name: Aquatic Ambush
additionalAbilities.description: The Darkling-Shark has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are surprised while in water or emerging from it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+2 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Large abomination, a twisted aquatic predator with crab legs and an unsettling presence

additionalAbilities.name: Unsettling Presence
additionalAbilities.description: Any creature within 25 ft. that witnesses the Darkforme-Shark's sudden transition from aquatic to terrestrial posture (as its crab legs engage) must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or suffer a 'brown note incident,' losing their reactions until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Ravenous Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6+4 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium elemental abomination, a shadowy presence that instills fear with its eerie, whispering darkness

additionalAbilities.name: Eerie Brown Note
additionalAbilities.description: Any creature within 25 ft. that witnesses the Darkling-Nightshade Elemental channel its shadow energy must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or lose their reactions until the end of their next turn, overcome by overwhelming dread.

actions.name: Shadow Swipe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6+2 necrotic damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination elemental mage wielding both shadow and non-elemental magic in unsettling ways

additionalAbilities.name: Unsettling Brown Note
additionalAbilities.description: Any creature within 25 ft. that witnesses the Darkforme-less manifest its dark magic must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or lose their reactions until the end of their next turn.

additionalAbilities.name: Umbral Empowerment
additionalAbilities.description: As a bonus action, the Darkforme-less can channel ominous energy to either grant one allied darkling within 30 ft. temporary hit points equal to its Intelligence modifier (minimum 1) or add +2 to that ally's next attack roll. This effect lasts until the start of that ally's next turn.

actions.name: Shadow Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Umbral Blast
actions.description: The Darkforme-less releases a burst of dark energy. Each creature of its choice within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 necrotic damage.

flavor.description: Small abomination, a whimsical cactus creature that unexpectedly calls for help with its backup spines.

additionalAbilities.name: Grab Backup
additionalAbilities.description: As a bonus action, the Darkling-Cactine may attempt to disengage. Roll 1d2; on a roll of 2 it calls reinforcements that rejoin the fray 1d2 rounds later in adjacent squares.

actions.name: Prickly Jab
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+2 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, a bristling cactus menace with brutal spike attacks and a lethal grappling maneuver called Heel ¡Lucha!

additionalAbilities.name: Heel ¡Lucha!
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkforme-Spinebearer successfully grapples a creature, it may use a bonus action to initiate Heel ¡Lucha! The target takes an extra 2d6 piercing damage and becomes restrained until it escapes. The grappled creature may attempt to break free by making a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (DC 14) as an action.

actions.name: Spike Jab
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+3 piercing damage.

actions.name: Spine Barrage
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10+1 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Small abomination, a chunkier, delightfully round cactus creature whose smooth exterior hides microcrystalline spines. Quick-footed and mischievous, it combines the call for backup of its kin with a painful, restraining embrace.

additionalAbilities.name: Relentless Backup
additionalAbilities.description: At the end of its turn, the Darkling-Cactine-Biggo-Boy automatically calls for reinforcements. Reinforcements arrive in 1d2 rounds. When backup arrives, roll a d100: on a result of 75 or lower, the reinforcement is a plain Darkling-Cactine; on a result of 76 or higher, a fellow Biggo-Boy joins the fray. Reinforcements appear in adjacent squares.

additionalAbilities.name: Painful Embrace
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkling-Cactine-Biggo-Boy successfully grapples a creature, it may use a bonus action to execute a painful embrace. The target takes an additional 1d6 piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or be restrained until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spiny Jab
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+1 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Small abomination, a sinuous reptilian darkling whose shimmering scales ripple as it slithers silently.

additionalAbilities.name: Slithering Escape
additionalAbilities.description: Once per turn, the Darkling-Slitherscale can disengage without provoking opportunity attacks, dodging away with slick, sinuous movements.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+2 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, a grotesque creature with elongated, enveloping limbs that suffocate its prey with a crushing grip.

additionalAbilities.name: Suffocating Embrace
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkeforme-Suffocator grapples a creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check at the start of its turn or take 1d8 crushing damage as it struggles for air.

actions.name: Crushing Grip
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+2 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

flavor.description: Huge abomination, a colossal serpentine dark serpent whose abyssal form can crush, devour, and lunge forth from the shadows with terrifying reach.

additionalAbilities.name: Serpent-Lance Lunge
additionalAbilities.description: If the Darkaconda has not moved on its previous turn, it may spend that turn coiling. During the coiling turn it can still make head or tail attacks; on the following turn, it can extend up to 60 ft. in any direction and make one attack using any of its available actions. This ability recharges on a 5–6 roll at the start of its turn.

additionalAbilities.name: Swallow
additionalAbilities.description: When the Darkaconda grapples a creature, it can attempt to swallow it. A swallowed creature takes 2d8 piercing damage at the start of each of the Darkaconda’s turns and is restrained. The creature can attempt to escape by succeeding on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.

actions.name: Shadow Lunge
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8+4 piercing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Coil
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6+4 bludgeoning damage.

flavor.description: Tiny abomination, a cute yet annoying hooter whose gutwrenching call shakes nerves.

additionalAbilities.name: Gutwrenching Hootery
additionalAbilities.description: As a bonus action, this Darkling-Hooter emits an ear-piercing hoot. Any creature within 25 ft. must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw—with the DC increasing by +5 for every additional Darkling-Hooter hooting that round—or lose its reaction until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Peck
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium abomination, a larger and aggressive hooter whose piercing, debilitating peck leaves foes breathless—and reactionless.

actions.name: Debilitating Peck
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+2 piercing damage. The target is overwhelmed by a brown note effect and loses its reaction until the end of its next turn.

flavor.description: Large abomination, a majestic aerial predator rumored to have inspired umbral raven forms. With perfect flight and lethal swoop-and-dive tactics, it dominates the heavens.

additionalAbilities.name: Aerial Ace
additionalAbilities.description: When targeting a creature that is flying, the Sky-Darkener Nightveil gains a +3 supernatural bonus to its attack roll on one attack per round.

additionalAbilities.name: Swoop and Dive
additionalAbilities.description: As an action, the Sky-Darkener Nightveil can dive from the sky to make a melee attack. If the target is unprepared, it is knocked prone. This attack deals an extra 1d8 slashing damage.

actions.name: Taloned Strike
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6+4 slashing damage.

flavor.description: Tiny abomination, a small little bone guy with an annoying shin-smacking attack that falls apart when defeated. Occasionally, its scattered bones reassemble—if not consecrated—minutes later.

additionalAbilities.name: Bone Reassembly
additionalAbilities.description: When defeated, the Darkling-Ossokin shatters into scattered bones. At 10 seconds and again 24 hours later, roll a d100; on a result of 10 or lower (for each window), if its remains haven't been consecrated, the bones reassemble into a functioning creature.

actions.name: Shin Smack
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

flavor.description: Medium bone golem abomination with a large build. Its fearsome, unliving bulk forms an unyielding defensive bulwark on the battlefield.

additionalAbilities.name: Bony Bulwark
additionalAbilities.description: At the start of its turn, the Darkling-Ossuite Aegisite gains temporary hit points equal to its proficiency bonus. Additionally, one adjacent ally gains a +2 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Bone Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+2 bludgeoning damage.

flavor.description: Large centauroid abomination darkling with four-legged speed and a bow that fires arrow-tipped tendrils. Those struck must succeed on a saving throw or be grappled by the sticky tendrils, which attach with 10 HP and an AC of 8.

additionalAbilities.name: Arrow-Tipped Tendrils
additionalAbilities.description: When the Charger fires its bow, each target hit must succeed on a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) saving throw or be grappled. Tendrils attached function as objects with 10 HP and an AC of 8.

actions.name: Tendril Bow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+3 piercing damage. On a hit, the target must make a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) saving throw or be grappled.

flavor.description: Huge abomination—a living ossuary formed by countless ossuite remains fused into a massive, lumbering bone monster. It shuffles slowly along the floor, exuding a pants‐crapping fear presence. Its hideous body carries brutal melee attacks reminiscent of lesser ossuite kin, and it wields an array of dark, divine spells that combine arcane and clerical power. Once per day, it can teleport to a new space, forcing all in its wake to contend with a crushing, pinning avalanche of bones.

stats.legendaryActionsDescription: The darkforme-ossuarian can take the Legendary Action listed below once per day, recharging at Midnight.

additionalAbilities.name: Pants-Crapping Fear Presence
additionalAbilities.description: Any creature within 30 ft. that can see the Darkforme-Ossuarian must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute- as well as hypermess or hyperwet their current smallclothes.

additionalAbilities.name: Living Ossuary Spellcasting
additionalAbilities.description:
The Darkforme-Ossuarian is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spells). It has the following spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): Toll the Dead, Spare the Dying
• 1st level (4 slots): Inflict Wounds, Guiding Bolt
• 2nd level (3 slots): Spiritual Weapon, Hold Person, Blindness/Deafness
• 3rd level (2 slots): Animate Dead, Blight, Bestow Curse
These spells—many rendered with a divine twist—augment its already deadly melee prowess.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Darkforme-Ossuarian makes two Bone Slam attacks and one Bone Rake attack.

actions.name: Bone Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8+5 bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bone Rake
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On a hit, the target suffers 1d8+5 slashing damage and, if already grappled by the ossuarian, becomes restrained until the end of its next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Bone Crush Teleport
legendaryActions.description: Once per day, the Darkforme-Ossuarian can teleport to any space it can see. Any creature occupying that space must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 2d10 crushing damage and become pinned. A pinned creature can attempt to break free at the end of each of its turns by succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) or Escape Artist check (DC 15).

flavor.description: A small, skeletal abomination support creature, its form composed of formless black and smoky miasmic condensate. This eerie being channels divine energy to aid its ossuite and ossokin allies. Its uncanny, bone-like structure belies its cleric abilities, and it wields a handful of divine spells – including the cantrip Spontaneous Accident – to bolster its kin in battle.

additionalAbilities.name: Divine Spellcasting
additionalAbilities.description:
The creature is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:
• Cantrips (Spontaneous Accident, Guidance)
• 1st level (Bless, Cure Wounds)
• 2nd level (Lesser Restoration, Aid)
These divine spells and cleric abilities are focused on supporting and bolstering its ossuite and ossokin allies.

additionalAbilities.name: Ossuaries' Boon
additionalAbilities.description: Once per short rest, when an allied ossuite or ossokin is within 5 ft., the proselyte can grant that ally a bonus to saving throws equal to its Wisdom modifier (minimum +1) until the start of the ally's next turn.

actions.name: Bone Tap
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+1 bludgeoning damage.
